name: TableStyle
desc: The object for defining a style for rows, columns, cells, and headers in a table.

items.name: cells
items.desc: Defines the styling for individual cells in a table.

items.name: columns
items.desc: Defines the styling for table columns.

items.name: headerCells
items.desc: Defines the styling for individual cells in table headers.

items.name: headerColumns
items.desc: Defines the styling for the table header columns, which are present if dataOrientation is set to vertical, which is the default.

items.name: headerRows
items.desc: Defines the styling for table header rows, which are present if dataOrientation is set to horizontal, which is not the default

items.name: rows
items.desc: Defines the styling for table rows.
